Tips for Kfc Doesn't Recommend columbusmorgan Joined 2 years ago 1.0 January 25, 2010 Horrilble Service by the GM !. I waited in the drive thru for 6 minutes on a weekday at 12:50 in the afternoon. She(christina) took my order..got to window and asked why it took so long.reply ..."Its lunch and were busy"was the reply...2 cars in the drive thru.I asked for the corporate number .I then asked for water with my combo to not have to pay taxes.Her responce was she couldn't do it...I said..."your the GM you can do anything"she said why bother when you are going to call corporate on me anyway.I asked for my money back at that point. If your in a hurry and want chicken.....Don't go to KFC on route 94 in Wadsworth. … View More View Less 0 Heart Contributor Joined 9 years ago August 02, 2008 For more than 60 years, this all-American institution has been serving its signature chicken and home-style sides.. In Short Established in 1939, this fast-food restaurant still makes its legendary fried chicken with the closely guarded blend of 11 herbs and spices originally created by founder Colonel Sanders. Modern additions to the menu include oven-roasted renditions of its chicken sandwiches, popcorn chicken, potato wedges and wraps. Classic sides include flaky, oversized biscuits, steaming-hot mashed potatoes and gravy, smoky-sweet baked beans and crisp, generously dressed coleslaw. Kids and adults love the "little bucket" parfaits of pudding desserts. … View More View Less 0 Heart
